title: Migration
description: Configure and run your migration using the checklist on the right. Select your Master ID to begin the migration process and map your entry types for data transfer.

title: Master ID Store
description: Select the Master ID that corresponds to your migration target. This ID will be used to identify and organize your migrated data.

title: Entry Types
description: Drag tasks from the left bucket and drop them on matching tasks in the right bucket. Each match creates a one-to-one mapping with a unique connection line.

title: Entry Type Attributes
description: Drag tasks from the left bucket and drop them on matching tasks in the right bucket. Each match creates a one-to-one mapping with a unique connection line.

title: Logic Apps
description: Select a Logic App from the dropdown to view its workflow definition. The visualization shows triggers, actions, and nested workflows.
